Question: This person has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a Tony (for production, not acting), and an Oscar.
Hints: This person has been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards for her work in television.
This person made her film debut in The Color Purple (1985), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
O'Donnell stated on her official blog that she wanted this person to be moderator.
